title.label: Not a skier but love this game

content.label: Unbelievable game play. Amazing graphics. Can play for 5 minutes at a time or for hours. Great concept with planned ski runs combined with having to search the mountains for special passes and hidden ski runs. Music is cool, the sun sets on the mountains. You can get lost in this game. Would love to know what else you make.
This game is extremely impressive for a mobile game.  It would be cool to see maps modeled after actual resorts in the future. Awesome game!

title.label: Would have paid the free version lol

content.label: The simplicity and superior controls make this game extremely fun. Let alone the very high skill cap, this game seems to capture more than just the main enjoyment of skiing, adding a level of depth I haven't seen in any other mobile game. The free version is an entire game on its own, with the expanse of the full version there is no doubt I will be playing this game for a while.

Looks great. Sounds great. Seemed like I was just slowly pottering around though. Nothing happening. Couldn‚Äôt really ski. Boring. Whoever made this doesn‚Äôt really have an eye for adventurous game playing. Looked like an opportunity lost. Pretty bad game actually. Is it a game? Seemed more like a simulation of what it‚Äôs like to go to a really flat ski resort. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title.label: Best game ive played in years on my phone... and im not lying

content.label:
The maps, the graphics, the missions... 10/10
Realism 8/10 (it would be cool to gain more speed on steep slopes)
Camera 7/10 (it would be cool to look downwards too)
Ski/Snowboard options (it would be cool to select different boards and skiis for different styles ie tricks, slalom...) 

Average score: 10/10. Those other points dont matter :) fun as hell

If you like the ability to go wherever you want and challenge your skills when you want, this is an excellent sandbox world to do it in. The free version won‚Äôt bother you with ads, and $5 for the full experience of more mountains to explore is well worth it. A great escape with excellent graphics, physics, and playability. Way more than just a ‚Äòtap to jump‚Äô snowboarding game.

title.label: Got Ski/Snowboard withdrawals? Download this game.

content.label: I‚Äôm one of those guys that never buys apps because a $5 app is too expensive, meanwhile I download $60 Xbox games. This is one of the few apps I‚Äôve ever purchased in-game content for. It‚Äôs addicting. If you‚Äôre going through shredding withdraws thanks to COVID, this game is the best there is to help cure that itch! Amazing graphics, smooth sandbox-styled gameplay, many maps with lots of ranked challenges. The fun lasts for as long as you want it to. Easy 5 stars from me!

title.label: Fun game but needs a little more

content.label: The maps are fun and overall the game is pretty well done. It would be nice if there was a wider variety of tricks to perform though.
Amazing

First off, 
devs if you‚Äôre reading this- i LOVE your responses to bad reviews üòÇüòÇ

the controls are so nice, graphics are AMAZING!

honestly, it‚Äôs great. Get it!

As an aging snowboarder who doesn‚Äôt live anywhere near a resort, this game provides a great escape and truly magnificent mountains to free ride on.  The graphics and feel are the best I‚Äôve found in a game and there are plenty of challenges to find to unlock new areas.  The controls are a little wonky at times and the camera angles can be frustrating but all in all this is a very fun and beautiful game with great replay value.
Zenboarding. Almost feels like being in a Wes Anderson film.
I like it

Deleted app so that the iPhone 12 pro wouldn‚Äôt fly across the room.  

Music and graphics great.  Just want to ski all the mountains.  The challenges are horrible for that fly over angle.  

Will stick to lonely mountain due to a hand held controller is much more ideal with the fly over perspective.

I absolutely love the game I love the sport and I love the attention to detail. It‚Äôs like the person who designed this game was also a huge fan of the sport and knew exactly what to put in and what to leave out. However my only suggestion would be to add a online function so that I can ski with my friends and enjoyed the time inside during COVID-19. Please let me know if this is going to be a future update or is in the agenda for the future.

it is the perfect game AND no microtransactions!!!

buy this game and enjoy!!!

title.label: If your missing video game free roam look no further

content.label:
It‚Äôs worth it. 
Especially if you miss playing tony hawk free roams and just chillen out this give that nostalgia with a icy freshness.

title.label: Great game (more maps and first person mode)

content.label: Hi, i love the game. However it would be nice if there were more maps. I have maxed out all maps and am kinda j skiing around trying to break my previous records. LOVE THE GAME so original and exactly what i was looking for in a ski game. Just more maps would be nice.  Also please add a first person mode!!‚Äô It would be awesomeeeee Thanks!!!

title.label: Super fun but the camera angle...

content.label: Bought the full game because it is super fun and addicting. But the camera angle just makes this game so frustrating and some levels so hard to beat because you can‚Äôt see anything. If feels like you‚Äôre working against the camera angle the whole game.
Play this game with some Lo Fi Hip Hop radio do this with zen mode on, instant depression or anxiety/stress cured.
Absolutely love this game and so cheap for what you get!

I got this game yesterday and ever since I got it I have been playing it.
I love the graphics and the animals in the game like the bear that roars at you if you go by it.
Yesterday I jumped a mountain and this morning I skied on the water that is by the start of the map it was fun.
I really like the missions you do like the Mountain Voyage  they are fun but challenging.
Lastly, If you are reading this by this app, it is amazing.
The game is so calming, addicting, and fun. I would like there to be landing backwards and still go.

This game is excellent. I don‚Äôt even ski but this game makes me want to. You can go  anywhere you want and just cruise around or compete against yourself in timed runs. The graphics are top notch and the controls are simple and make sense. Highly recommend.
Love this game, however I wouldn‚Äôt say it is a relaxing game if you are a competitive skier/snowboarder lol.
Actually seemed like a great game, but it was too glitchy to enjoy.

Wow, and what can I say other than wow? Just read through the lower rated reviews and you can see just how seething the developer is as it concerns their own poor design. The controls are wonky, the camera is wonky, and it is a majority who complain about both. 

Does the dev take the time out of their day to address these concerns? No, the dev would rather waste the time they could spend rectifying problems on insulting and condescending to their customers. Even paid customers are being treated as if they are the problem, rather than the dev recognizing the apparent flaws. 

One star because of the crass, inappropriate, and condescending comments left by the dev to even those who were silly enough to pay for a game that should be free. 

Shame.
Probably some of the best iPhone game graphics I‚Äôve ever seen. Super relaxed yet immersive. I love it
Getting used to the controls was a bit confusing but I took off and love it... we need more maps !!

Overall the game is very good.

My one major pet peeve is I wish the perspective could be changed to looking downhill. 

The uphill facing perspective feels very off to me. 

I was surprised this isn‚Äôt an option in the settings menu.

It‚Äôs like playing a driving game where you can only see in the rear view mirror. üòÇ
I am in love with this game. Simple, intuitive, but also challenging. Seriously would pay another $5 for more mountains, I just can‚Äôt get enough.

What an incredibly, beautiful crafted game! The only thing you can‚Äôt do is eat on the mountain, lol. Wonderful job, the graphics are amazing. I absolutely love how you can actually ski down to a chair lift that takes you back up to the top. This game will definitely make you smile. Great job, thank you for developing this!!!

I downloaded this and finished the first map in about a week and i‚Äôm thinking of buying the full game. It‚Äôs a pretty fun a relaxing game with a few good challenges. 

I would like to be able to zoom in more on the character and have an option to see it from the opposite side for a new perspective. I also wish the markings on the map were a bit easier to understand because it took my the longest time to figure out which double diamond i was missing. But overall this game is really well made and fun!

So not even 20mins into the game I fell in love. I love skiing and it really blew me away. The noises and graphics are excellent, the bots in the game that have messages are fun to have around, and multi player is very good. So over all, developer and creator ur game hits it right off the bat and I love the low Polly style that you chose :) Best  game ever worth every penny. ;)
I have all ski passes but it‚Äôs not letting me I‚Äôve stressed but it‚Äôs not letting me unlock them

title.label: Do not buy the full game

content.label: DO NOT BUY THE FULL GAME. The game is very fun but the controls are to simple. So much so that everyone you end up trying to stop you jump. Aside from the terrible perspective on your snowboarder. Play the free version and delete. It‚Äôs a waste of 5 dollars when the rest of the mountain requires much better controls to get literary anything done. Wish I could get my 5 bucks back

title.label: I don‚Äôt usually pay for mobile games but..!

content.label: This game stole my heart. I love the graphics and sounds. The controls are pretty decent and you get a good sense of the world from the camera. Tons of little easter eggs to check out. Love it!

title.label: The free version has enough to have you playing for hours

content.label: As soon as I realized there were more maps I lost it because I had put so much time into the free Austria map! Fantastic game.
Grady is a pp
Love the game, but one change would be to allow us to reset everything when we finish the last mountain. I would like to start again, but it won‚Äôt let me reset.
Seems like an okay game. Would be five stars if you actually followed behind the skier. Why would I want to face the skier to play? Lost me at that.

When people complain about the game being free and then you sneak in having to buy the other maps after you beat the first one in less then ten minutes kinda feels unrewarding. Loved the game but I will not pay the extra money to play the other maps. You basically beg in the 1 star responses to pay the game so you can ‚Äúcontinue development‚Äù really a waste of time to be fair.
I like skiing and I makes me feel like I am skiing
Please make more mountains it would make the game twice as fun also if you had like a park mountain or a free ride mountain with helicopter rides that would be sick

Probably the most fun ski game I‚Äôve ever played. I love the variety on the courses. Sometimes slalom. Sometimes tricks. Somethings distance or height. Sometimes avoid crashing into buildings. 

Only wishes
1. Sometimes camera angles can feel disorienting. 
2. I wish some of the music was more relaxing like alto.

title.label: Too less maps for what I paid and should have friend add and voice chat

content.label: I feel there are too less maps for what I paid. I also think it would be funner to play with friends and you could add them in game. There should also be voice chat so we both can ski down and talk. Also the mountains are small. I feel you get down the mountain too fast.

title.label: Gives a very relaxing refreshing free

content.label: I haven‚Äôt played that made relax,Great background piano music and the the graphics and FPS are great fun overall a great game 5/5 Will be purchasing the full game

Cannot stop playing. So smooth and just fun all around. Trying to beat myself or others or just free-riding is probably the best iOS game I‚Äôve ever played and that‚Äôs saying a lot for me.  Play and enjoy. Would live a Jew map sooner or later.

Honestly a really really fun game, super satisfying and relaxing. The only things I might add are a way to change to camera angle to a more first-person view and then maybe a map that‚Äôs all super crazy terrain that‚Äôs relatively easy to access. It would be fun to get to really push the physics of this game with some huge jumps/drops.

This is by far one of the best snowboarding, skiing, open world games for mobile. Yes you do have to pay for the full version, but its a small price to pay for such a good game. 
1: The game quality is super good. The little people are detailed and the snow effects are by far the most realistic I‚Äôve seen. 
2: The actually game play is relaxing and fun. It‚Äôs not boring and you can do tricks for days. Each mission does have its challenges, but for the most part its doable.
3: the music and the feel of the game is relaxing and almost soothing. Playing it in the evening is sorta fun.

4: PLEASE ADD MORE MAPS!!!

Overall its a great game, yes it does have some down falls, but those are minor compared to the entirety of the game.
